name: Email Spam Triggers
description: Words and patterns that trigger email spam filters

seo.title: Email Spam Triggers Checklist v1.0.0 | lksy.org
seo.description: Community-maintained list of 18 words and patterns that trigger email spam filters. Free, open source, version-controlled.

checks.name: Excessive Caps Lock
checks.description: Detect when more than 50% of email content is in uppercase
checks.rationale: Excessive capitalization is a strong spam signal and looks unprofessional

checks.name: Spam Trigger Words
checks.description: Detect common spam trigger words like 'FREE', 'ACT NOW', 'CLICK HERE', 'URGENT'
checks.rationale: These words are heavily weighted by spam filters

checks.name: Excessive Exclamation Marks
checks.description: Detect more than 2 exclamation marks in subject line or excessive use in body
checks.rationale: Multiple exclamation marks are a spam indicator

checks.name: Suspicious URLs
checks.description: Detect URL shorteners, suspicious domains, or mismatched link text
checks.rationale: Suspicious links are a major red flag for spam filters

checks.name: Unreplaced Personalization Tokens
checks.description: Detect [FIRSTNAME], {{firstName}}, or similar tokens that weren't replaced
checks.rationale: Unreplaced tokens look unprofessional and trigger spam filters

checks.name: Excessive Emoji Usage
checks.description: Detect more than 3 emojis in subject line or excessive use in body
checks.rationale: Too many emojis can trigger spam filters

checks.name: Cryptocurrency Keywords
checks.description: Detect cryptocurrency-related keywords that often trigger spam filters
checks.rationale: Crypto content is frequently flagged as spam

checks.name: Money Symbols
checks.description: Detect excessive use of money symbols ($, €, £) or 'get rich' language

checks.name: All Caps Subject Line
checks.description: Detect subject lines written entirely in uppercase
checks.rationale: All caps subject lines are almost always marked as spam

checks.name: Suspicious Attachments
checks.description: Detect executable files, zip files, or suspicious attachment types
checks.rationale: Suspicious attachments are major spam indicators

checks.name: Excessive Hyperlinks
checks.description: Detect more than 5 links in email body
checks.rationale: Too many links can trigger spam filters

checks.name: Image-Only Email
checks.description: Detect emails with only images and no text content

checks.name: Suspicious Sender Address
checks.description: Detect suspicious sender email addresses (noreply, no-reply, suspicious domains)
checks.rationale: Suspicious sender addresses are spam indicators

checks.name: Phishing Keywords
checks.description: Detect common phishing keywords like 'verify account', 'suspended', 'action required'

checks.name: Excessive Punctuation
checks.description: Detect excessive use of punctuation marks (???, !!!, ...)
checks.rationale: Excessive punctuation is a spam indicator

checks.name: Red Flag Words
checks.description: Detect words like 'guarantee', 'no risk', 'limited time', 'act now'
checks.rationale: Sales pressure words trigger spam filters

checks.name: Suspicious HTML Structure
checks.description: Detect suspicious HTML patterns, hidden text, or obfuscated content
checks.rationale: Suspicious HTML is often used by spammers

checks.name: Low Text to Image Ratio
checks.description: Detect emails with very little text compared to images
checks.rationale: Low text-to-image ratio is a spam indicator
